Welcome to bizwrap3 Minimal Multipurpose Template built using Gulp, Sass & bootstrap4

Bizwrap is a professional Minimal multipurpose template for any business or portfolio website, it’s fully responsive design ready to look stunning on any device.


Version - V3.0

Url - http://bootstraplovers.com/bootstrap4/bizwrap3.0/html

Support - mylifedesign143@gmail.com

Last Update - N/A

1. Basic of bizwrap3 Template


Template structure

intro-bootstrap4/html
├── css/
│   ├── style.css (compiled from style.scss)
│   ├── Plugins
│        └── plugins.css (all plugins css compile into one css file)
├── js/
│   ├── app.js (customize js file of eland)
│   ├── Plugins
│        └── plugins.js (all plugins js files compile into one js file)
└── scss/
    ├── _variables.scss
    ├── _base.scss
    ├── _buttons.scss
    ├── _navbar.scss
    ├── _......./.scss
    └── style.scss (main scss file)
└── img (all images)/
└── ionicons (icon fonts)/
    ├── fonts
    ├── style.css
└── node_modules (npm install packages)/
└── gulpfile.js (gulp workflow manager)/
└── package.json (npm dependencies)/

Html Structure

2.Css Use


Using gulp sass

  1. If you are familier with gulp and sass, there are good news because Bizwrap is built using gulp and sass
  2. Before using gulp and sass make sure you have installed some dependencies into your system like NodeJs, gulp and gulp sass
  3. Open cammand line and write gulp watch. This cammand line will auto compile sass files into css file

Not familier with sass

No Problem - You can directly use the bizwrap3.0/html/assets/css/style.css for edit the template style.

3. juqery

Juqery plugins are install by Bower

For install a plugin open command line and type like this bower install plugin-name

bizwrap3 landing page are depend on Jquery & bootstrap js, Make sure you have included the jquery and bootstrap js files before adding any othr files path

For Add, Edit or delete the bizwrap jquery functions, open bizwrap3.0/assets//html/js/app.js and edit it.

4. Contact Form

We have included a contact form into this template, for make it working open bizwrap3.0/html/assets/mail/contact_me.php file and edit your email id here - $to = 'me@myprogrammingblog.com'; // put your email;

Make sure your project is running on online server to make contact form working.

5.Icon fonts

We have using the elegant icons font set into this template.

<i class="icon_adjust-horiz"></i>

Get full list of icons from here - Elegant icons
